attributes.additional_details: I want the government to abolish the TV licence fee. From 01/04/24 the annual cost of a TV licence will rise to £169.50. Not taking into account inflation and future fee increases over the average persons lifetime that's roughly £10,509 . The TV Licence fee is outdated, not fit for the 21st century and an unnecessary tax on the public.
attributes.background: Stop the TV licence fee and force the BBC to find alternative ways to fund itself.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649092
Abolish the TV licence and make the BBC a subscription channel
